website_summaries.verdict: National Geographic and Mattel have teamed up to present a Barbie working as a wildlife conservationist, making her the perfect gift for a child who loves animals.
pros: Barbie wears a utilitarian outfit for studying in the wild
Great for supporting kids with an interest in nature
Includes research notebook and monkey friend
cons: More animal accessories would have been appreciated

customer_reviews.title: I guess there really is a Barbie for me after all
customer_reviews.text: I grew up a tomgirl and didn't really play with dolls. I think part of it was that there were things I'd rather be doing, like playing with bugs, but I think part of it as well was that there weren't any Barbie dolls I could connect to. They all seemed so superficial. I wanted a career and to make a difference, even from that young age. Well, my prayers have been answered. I dedicated my entire life to wildlife conservation and I think I found the doll for me, albeit 2 decades later. I guess there really is a Barbie for me after all.
customer_reviews.author: ANP

customer_reviews.title: Barbie with cool monkey
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my niece for Christmas. I like that the lady is not caucasian like every other Barbie doll seems to be. Nothing wrong with that but trying to find a more Native American barbie is hard.
customer_reviews.author: Cipher 8

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and in perfect condition. This doll is the “curvy Barbie” and fits other “curvy Barbie” clothes. The monkey is cute. The only downside is the little book in her hand is just a flimsy piece of cardboard. My little one loves her. Perfect gift idea for little explorers and animal lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Chesnee

customer_reviews.title: Barbie’s a NatGeo Natural
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this Barbie to a little naturalist niece. This Barbie has better, real life proportions and musculature (due, I’m sure to the many adventures in the brush).
customer_reviews.author: Danai Lamb

customer_reviews.title: My niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and my niece loved it. I wanted to give her a Barbie that was a little different. She’s getting to be that age where she’s talking about wanting to be a teacher or a doctor. I believe that by buying these types of toys, we can plant little seedlings in youngster’s brains that could perhaps sprout into wonderfully full imaginations and visualizations of the universe, their futures, and the happiness that is possible in this life when we walk through the cracked doors in the hallways of the mundane.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan C.

customer_reviews.title: Something NEW!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful to have a Barbie doll representing Nat Geo!!! Cute monkey too!
customer_reviews.author: Grammie

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved this Barbie with her lil Monkey
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loved this Barbie with her lil Monkey. One of the Barbies that isn't a toothpick in body proportions, but all of her little Barbie Dresses still fit this doll.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: She looks just like me!
customer_reviews.text: I gifted the doll, but I love the fact that she is representative of the brown culture. She has hips and a little pooch just like me! Well done Barbie!
customer_reviews.author: Felicia M. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: Doll looks good but clothing does not look as it appears in the photo. Clothing on the doll is sloppily loose fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Arredondo

customer_reviews.text: Doll was great but packaging was crushed. It was a gift from the big guy and never made it under the tree.
customer_reviews.author: Sjc

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: This doll with the monkey is so cute! Love the NatGeo line of Barbies! The monkey fits perfectly in the crook of the doll's arm and stays well during play.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Great doll. Lovelly hair with red highlights. I do wish the knees bent.
customer_reviews.author: MonPetitChou

customer_reviews.title: Packaging ruined
customer_reviews.text: The package was severely damaged. Ended up taking it out of the box before gifting it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to be able to purchase a doll with a purpose and a career instead of a doll just based on looks. My niece loved this doll too.
customer_reviews.author: A. Velazquez

customer_reviews.title: Doll packaging cut open and damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Damaged Barbie packaging. Plastic cut open, and cannot be used for a collector or to give as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lita B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday gift for my granddaughter. Love the attention to detail on the doll's uniform and the little monkey was a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Cathi Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Its a beautiful doll
customer_reviews.text: My box came broken damage .not pleased i wanted to present it as a gift but now i cant. Very upset
customer_reviews.author: nishkabryab

product_meta.title: Barbie Wildlife Conservationist Doll, Brunette with Monkey and Notebook, Inspired by National Geographic for Kids 3 Years to 7 Years Old
product_meta.description: Barbie doll is an adventurous spirit, always enthusiastic about exploring the world, and she's partnered with National Geographic to encourage imagination, expression and discovery through play. Protect endangered species with the wildlife conservationist doll -she wears a professional outfit with themed accessories that include a monkey! Collect all of the Barbie National Geographic dolls to expand a child's horizons (each sold separately, subject to availability). Kids will love making new discoveries and dreaming about their future because when a girl plays with Barbie, she imagines everything she can become! Includes Barbie wildlife conservationist doll wearing a professional outfit with notebook and monkey figure. Doll cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.
feature_bullets: ​Barbie doll and National Geographic have partnered to encourage imagination, expression and discovery through play -- these four career dolls are ready to help them write their own stories!
​Barbie wildlife conservationist doll is dressed for the field wearing brown pants, a tan top detailed with insignia and pocket details and green shoes.
​An adorable monkey is just waiting for animal lovers to save it!
​Use her notebook to look at her latest observations.
​Makes a great gift for kids 3 years to 7 years old curious about the world, nature and science -- collect all the Barbie career dolls and toys to inspire kids to dream!

Young minds will love helping Barbie and National Geographic further the work of scientists, explorers and educators around the world because when a girl plays with Barbie, she imagines everything she can become!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars212 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
